01810 
01811 void TriggerHandlerCalice::PrepareTriggerEventData(const LCEvent* evt) {
01812 
01813   // this is already done in the method where prepare is called:
01814 
01815   //  // better use a member variable then a local static variable.
01816   //  //  //A local variable to check whether the the method has already been
01817   //  //  //called for this event
01818   //  //  //  static LCTime last_update_time;
01819 
01820   LCTime theTime(evt->getTimeStamp());
01821   //Check whether the method has already been called for this event
01822   if(_theTime.timeStamp() == theTime.timeStamp()) return; 
01823   _theTime=theTime;
01824   
01825   //Do the integrity check of the configured trigger bits here
01826   //(currently lccd leaves no other chance) 
01827 
01828   //TriggerConditionsListener();
01829 
01830 
01831   // clear the result of the trigger validation.
01832   _distanceToPreTrigger.clear();
01833   //Reset the fifo content
01834   _theTriggerFifoCont.clear();
01835 
01836     
01837     // the collection name is unique
01838   if (_trgEventClass == kFeTrgEvent || _trgEventClass == kUnknown) {
01839   try {
01840     const LCCollection* col = evt->getCollection( _colNameTriggerEvent );
01841     
01842 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
01843     assert ( col->getNumberOfElements() == 1 );
01844 #endif
01845 
01846 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
01847     std::cout << "Event Number: " << evt->getEventNumber() << std::endl;
01848     std::cout << " Number of Elements"<< col->getNumberOfElements() << std::endl;
01849 #endif
01850 
01851     FeTrgData feTrgData(col->getElementAt(0));
01852     feTrgData.getFifoWords(_theTriggerFifoCont);
01853 
01854 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
01855       cout << "Fifo size FeTrg: " <<  _theTriggerFifoCont.size() << endl;
01856       if (_theTriggerFifoCont.size() > 0) {
01857         int icount(0); 
01858        for(IntVec::iterator vec_iter = _theTriggerFifoCont.begin();vec_iter != _theTriggerFifoCont.end(); vec_iter++){
01859          std::cout << "Fifo Element at " <<  icount << " is: " << std::hex << *vec_iter << std::dec << std::endl;
01860           icount++;
01861         }
01862       }
01863 #endif
01864 
01865   }
01866   catch (  DataNotAvailableException &err ) {
01867 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
01868       std::cout << "No FeTrgData in: " << evt->getEventNumber() << std::endl;
01869 #endif
01870   }
01871   }
01872 
01873   if(  _theTriggerFifoCont.size() == 0) {
01874 
01875   if (_trgEventClass == kBeTrgEvent || _trgEventClass == kUnknown) {
01876     try {
01877 
01878       const LCCollection* col = evt->getCollection( COL_TRIGGER_EVENT );
01879       BeTrgEvent beTrgEvent(col->getElementAt(0));
01880       _theTriggerFifoCont = beTrgEvent.getFifoWords(_theTriggerFifoCont);
01881 
01882 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
01883       cout << "Fifo size BeTrg: " <<  _theTriggerFifoCont.size() << endl;
01884       if (_theTriggerFifoCont.size() > 0) {
01885         int icount(0); 
01886         for(IntVec::iterator vec_iter = _theTriggerFifoCont.begin();vec_iter != _theTriggerFifoCont.end(); vec_iter++){
01887           std::cout << "Fifo Element at " <<  icount << " is: " << std::hex << *vec_iter << std::dec << std::endl;
01888           icount++;
01889         }
01890       }
01891 #endif      
01892       
01893     } catch (lcio::DataNotAvailableException err) {
01894 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
01895       std::cout << "No FeTrgData in: " << evt->getEventNumber() << std::endl;
01896 #endif
01897       }
01898   }
01899   }
01900 
01901   if(  _theTriggerFifoCont.size() == 0) {
01902     _noTriggerEvents++;
01903   }
01904   
01905   
01906     //    _last_update_time = _theTime;
01907     //  }
01908 }
01909 
01910 void TriggerHandlerCalice::ExtractTriggerCheckConditions(EVENT::LCCollection *checkCol){
01911 
01912 
01913   TriggerCheck trigger_check(checkCol->getElementAt(0)); 
01914   
01915   //Extract the words needed to validate the trigger
01916   _main_word = trigger_check.getMainWord();
01917   _tolerance = trigger_check.getTolerance();
01918   _word_up   = abs(trigger_check.getUpSearch());
01919   _word_down = -abs(trigger_check.getDownSearch());
01920 
01921   assert(_word_down<0);
01922   assert(_word_up>0);
01923 
01924 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
01925   std::cout << "TriggerHandlerCalice TriggerCheck main word: " << _main_word << std::endl;
01926   std::cout << "TriggerHandlerCalice TriggerCheck main word: " << _tolerance << std::endl;
01927   std::cout << "TriggerHandlerCalice TriggerCheck main word: " << _word_up << std::endl;
01928   std::cout << "TriggerHandlerCalice TriggerCheck main word: " << _word_down << std::endl;
01929 #endif
01930 
01931 
01932 }
01933 }
